BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, H.R. 430, establishing Lunar New Year Day as a Federal holiday.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: H.R. 430, establishing Lunar New Year Day as a Federal holiday.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing Lunar New Year as an annual school holiday and as an official holiday in the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing Lunar New Year as an annual school holiday and as an official holiday in the City of New York.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Marte and Feliz

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing Lunar New Year as an annual school holiday and as an official holiday in the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Recognizing Lunar New Year as an annual school holiday and as an official holiday in the City of New York.
